paragraphs: The legendary Ukrainian rock band "Okean Elzy" will give a large charity concert in Prague. It will take place on October 26, 2025, at the Fortuna sports arena (Za Elektrárnou 419/1, Praha 7).

The performance will take place as part of the global tour "Help for Ukraine tour". A portion of the proceeds from ticket sales will be donated to help children affected by the war, refugees, and defenders of Ukraine.
👉 Tickets can be purchased through this link.
🕖 Doors open at 6:00 PM, the event starts at 7:00 PM.
The world tour is dedicated to the 30th anniversary of the band.

At the Prague concert, "Okean Elzy" will perform both beloved hits by millions of Ukrainians and songs from two of their new albums - the tenth Ukrainian-language album "That Day" and the first album by the band in English called "LIGHTHOUSE".

Regarding the Ukrainian album, the leader of the group, Sviatoslav Vakarchuk, says: "This album is associated with awakening for me. With returning to myself after a long search. The album is not in vain in many ways similar to the early work of the group - it is light, inspiring, and genuine."
The album "LIGHTHOUSE" is a symbol of hope and strength! Each composition is a step towards the light that unites and inspires.
"Okean Elzy" on stage is powerful emotions, unique energy, and memories for a lifetime! Don't miss it!

The group was founded in 1994 in Lviv. Over the past decade, the musicians have performed in many countries around the world: Poland, Czech Republic, Germany, Latvia, Israel, Australia, Canada, USA, UK, and others.

"Okean Elzy" remains the only Ukrainian band that has managed to fill the largest stadium in Ukraine - the capital's "Olimpiyskiy" - three times. In 2014, 2016, and 2018, each concert of the band was attended by 70,000 to 85,000 spectators.

"Okean Elzy" is a true cultural phenomenon. Over the 30 years of their existence, the musicians have become an integral symbol of modern Ukraine. Fans around the world appreciate them for their sincerity, powerful lyrics, and incredible energy during live performances.
👉 Tickets for the Prague concert can be purchased through this link.
